These ingredients are known to improve digestion and reduce gas or bloating. - Simethicone reduces the excess gas in the stomach by reducing the surface tension of gas and making its expulsion easier. - Dill oil & fennel oil helps to relax the abdominal muscles and relieves colic pain, mild spasm and a bloated or swollen belly.
